examples: She put a blanket over the sleeping child.
Puso una manta sobre el niño dormido.
He wore an overcoat over his suit.
Llevaba un abrigo sobre su traje.
She put her hand over her mouth to stop herself from screaming.
Se tapó la boca con la mano para no gritar.
They held a large umbrella over her.
La cubrieron con un gran paraguas.
